item.title: Dynamic Filters: Passing Information Between Operators During Execution for 10x Faster Queries
item.description: This blog post introduces a powerful query engine optimization technique called dynamic filters or sideways information passing. We implemented this optimization in DataFusion as a community effort with care to support custom operators and distributed usage.
